description:
Fixed some out-of-place hi-hats

Fixed incorrect pattern in pre-outro. Number of 8th notes between 16th note pairs should go: 6 4 2 4 6

Added palm-muted octaves in outro. Listen to recording closely and watch live.
title: Bleed

description: changed the guitars to 8 string F standard tuning
title: Bleed

reports.summary: I used the gp5 file instead of the standard gp so the song got ruined in this revision

description: Fixed Inconsistencies with the Drum part such as incorrect cymbal timings, ghost notes on the snare, and fixed a kick phrase that was incorrect
title: Bleed

description:
Added delay again but with the atmosphere track

The solo should probably be put in a separate track, as a 7 string Half step down guitar since the low string takes up the high string, might get to it one of these days
title: Bleed

description:
Added Clean guitar for the bridge (and simulated delay with a second voicing on the track)

Removed grace notes and put them as normal notes because songsterr doesn't detect them

Also, they play at half a step down with 8 strings, not standard 8 string tuning. https://www.guitarworld.com/gear/meshuggah-share-secrets-their-sound
title: Bleed

reports.summary:
The tuning is wrong. Reference: https://www.guitarworld.com/gear/meshuggah-share-secrets-their-sound
They tune half a step down their 8 strings, not on standard tuning

description: got rid of the slap bass and overdriven guitar
title: Bleed

description: Actually fixed the bass as Dick plays in the same tuning as the rest of the band, in the same register. Added optional 5th string for more synamic range, but can be played on 3rd string.
